homePage.slogan3: Start your new coding adventure with 3 simple steps
homePage.step1Text1: Choose coding language that you prefer. Git clone sample repository or
homePage.step1Text2: it. You can choose sample from next languages.
homePage.step2Text: In your repository set your username in ANTHIVE file. Link your repository in profile settings page.
homePage.step3Text: Refactor code with your own strategies. Git push to origin. Start games, compete and climb the
homePage.feature1Text: Always wanted to learn coding but didnâ€™t know what to start with? Start right here. This turn-based strategy game is the most engaging way to learn real code. PIck a language, read the rules link to the rules and start learning right now.
homePage.feature2Text: This game is a great way to advance your programming skills while having fun and getting noticed. Master your current language of choice; or expand your understanding of a new one. By completing the levels you get trophies and certificates which will benefit you not only in the game but in real life.
homePage.feature3Text: Demonstrate your skills by competing with other developers in your language of choice. Demonstrate to everyone that your strategy is superior, your code is the most efficient and has no errors. Climb the leaderboard, improving your strategy. Let your bot dominate the tournaments.
homePage.videoTitle: This is a turn-based strategy game for your Bot.
homePage.videoText1: Compute, contemplate and plan each step of your ants. Send commands to your ants in order for them to collect food, bring it to your hive, and to grow your colony.
homePage.videoText2: A player with the biggest colony and least errors wins the game. To start the game please follow three steps below.
homePage.videoText3: For detailed rules please visit link
